situation: During recess, L avoided playing with classmates and chose instead to sit alone on a bench. When a group of peers approached him to join their game, L began to cry.
action: A TA came over and asked L why he was sitting alone but did not offer any further support or strategies. The TA simply advised L to join the playgroup and left.
effect: L remained on the bench throughout recess feeling overwhelmed, without any peer interaction.
topic: Social Interaction Challenges - Difficulties with peer interactions, challanges during
